name: pistillate
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
Pistillate flowers have female parts that are used in the process of reproduction (= making new plants): Larger insects were not able to make contact with the pistillate flowers. The number of staminate, pistillate, and sterile flowers in each of the inflorescences was counted.
More examplesFewer examplesPistillate flowers often lack pollen and can be less attractive to pollinators.The stamens in the pistillate flowers are small and infertile.The larger bees' visits to pistillate flowers were less frequent.No insects were observed on pistillate inflorescences.
